total.description: Total number of results returned by the search

start.description: The starting index of this set of results within the total set of results

url.description: The URL to the object on the server (e.g. https://api.chef.io/organizations/foo/nodes/bar)

data.description: The desired data. Each key corresponds to a key from the POST.

additionalProperties.description: The value of the attribute on the object (or null if the attribute was not on the object).
